ComicInfo.Summary:
Glamourpuss' new boyfriend shapes this entire issue, including 'Really Good Advice for Really Clueless Boyfriends,' a full-length comic story; 'When Avant Garde Went Retro' featuring Avant Garde Glamourpuss of Earth Ex trapped in a Time Loop by an arch foe; and 'Rehab Reflections '09' on glamourpuss' 8-week stint at Southern Ontario's Caring Clinics earlier this year. Cover by comics superstar Gene Colan!
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/glamourpuss-9/4000-173680/
ComicInfo.Title: Eve Jones as "Signature" Characture Continued; Rehab Reflections '09; A Lifetime of Shoes - For Free!; The Complete Heart of Juliet Jones; glamourpuss' Really Good Advice for Really Cluesless Boyfriends
